Shepherd Middle School/High School are allowing 3 spectators of those participating in Football, Volleyball, Cheerleading and Band to attend activities at Shepherd. We are required to get a list of those spectators and parents who are attending these events. If you are an individual who has been selected by a participant to attend an event, either in Shepherd or at another location, you will need to go to the Shepherd website and fill out the Spectator Signup form. We will also continue to stream all games on the NFHS network. This online process will start for the September 15, 2020 Middle School event at Shepherd.

Thank you for helping us in this matter.
Rich Hash
Shepherd AD
